=How to use js-core=
js-core allows to organize chains of calls to provide easier and more consistent way for working with DOM in JavaScript.

==Append `<script>` to `<head>`==
{{{
<script type="text/javascript" src="js-core-2.5.9.js"></script>
}}}

==Waiting for `DOMContentLoaded`==
{{{
$.ready(function() {
  // your code
});
}}}

==Framework structure==
Simple example without caching:
{{{
// fundamental methods
var core = {
  ie: …,
  …
};

function _$(arg) {
  this.node = typeof arg == 'string' ? document.getElementById(arg) : arg;
}

// basic methods
_$.prototype = {
  html: function(…) {
    …
  },
  child: function(…) {
    …
  },
  parent: function() {
  },
  …
};

function $(arg) {
  return new _$(arg);
}

// additional methods
$.ready = function(fn) {
  …
};
}}}
